name: MLParameterDescription
desc: A description of a model parameter that includes a default value and a constraint, if applicable.

items.name: var defaultValue: Any
items.desc: The default value for the parameter.

items.name: var key: MLParameterKey
items.desc: The key for this parameter description value.

items.name: var numericConstraint: MLNumericConstraint?
items.desc: The constraints of this paramter description value, if and only if the value is numerical.

items.name: class MLNumericConstraint
items.desc: The value limitations of a number.
